text.section: Unless exempted by KRS 224.50-854 or as authorized by KRS 224.50-856(4) and (5), no person shall accumulate more than twenty-five (25) waste tires at a time for processing, transport more than fifty (50) waste tires at a time, or accumulate more than one hundred (100) waste tires at a time without first registering and receiving a letter of approval from the cabinet.
The cabinet shall approve the registration when the registration requirements have been met.

law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 529, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1998.
